Class RequestContext.RCCookie

  • java.lang.Object
    • hr.fer.zemris.java.webserver.RequestContext.RCCookie
  • Enclosing class:
    RequestContext

    public static class RequestContext.RCCookie
extends java.lang.Object
    Cookie container used for marking web pages. Holds name, value, domain and path of the website.
    Version:
    1.0
    Author:
    Juraj Pejnovic
